728449f-a.text:
Arthur Kill Road, at the head of Rossville Avenue. Robinson's 1907 map and Bromley's 1917 map show the house to be on the A. Winant
property.
April 22, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.

2298 Arthur Kill Road, south side, east of Rossville Avenu The house belonged to George Oakley (1874 and 1898), and later (1907 and 1917), to Virginia Cutting. The dates refer to maps on

728373f-b.text:
2340 Arthur Kill Road, at the S. W. corner of Rossville Avenue, showing Court Rossville, Foresters of America. The house was owned by J.W. Miller in 1874; by Henry Winant in 1898 and by H.R. Winants in 1907. Dates refer to maps on which the owners' names appear. View 2 shows the rear of the house, viewing north on Rossville
Avenue from Hook Avenue.
Views 1, 2: April 20, 1929
View 3: September 7, 1936
P. L. Sperr
